message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.ArrayList' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.thebridge.utils.Utils'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.HashMap' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.thebridge.utils.Utils'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Map' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.thebridge.utils.Utils'.
'new' has incorrect indentation level 6, expected level should be 8.
